version_description: The store has been updated.

▼Issues Fixed
・App crashes when linking the account with, or transferring data with the Game Center.
・Dates did not change correctly in the game under certain circumstances.
・Certain players cannot be matched in PvP properly.
・Fixed other bugs

【Issues Fixed】
・Circumstances where players who initiated a disconnection were deemed as winners in PvP matches.
・Circumstances where missions for reaching certain Z Level could not be achieved.
・Characters could not be switched when forcing the

- Fixed battle issues
- Fixed surrounding display issues
- Adjusted some of the UI
- Fixed various other bugs
* Check the in-game News for more information.

A huge new update is now available!

【Update Contents】
- Added Hyperdimensional Co-Op, a new mode where you battle alongside players around the world.
Team up with a buddy and enjoy!

- Added a guild feature.
Gather guild membe

【Updates】
This app version's development environment has changed.
You will need to re-download the game data as a result of this update.
A stable connection is recommended when downloading.

【Issues Fixed】
- Fixed various bugs

【Updates】
-Matchmaking can now be performed by scanning a Friend Battle Lobby Code with your device's camera.
-Boost Panels can now be automatically selected during Soul Boost.
-Scroll function on all screens has been improved.

- A new battle system update is here for you to enjoy!
- Event Missions can now be checked by event.
- Added features for the 1st anniversary.

We just implemented a huge update!

[Update Contents]
・Added new Tournament of Power mode.

Compete against players all over the world for the best score!

・Added "Haste" feature for Adventure
